title: Our Most Controversial Gaming Opinions - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 105 (Pt. 4)
description:
We talk about our most controversial gaming opinions.

Thanks to Shari's Berries for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.berries.com with the promo code Gamescast

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

You can trade it in, but you can't necessarily return it. B in the store, or it's digital, and you just own it – it's that thing. But for us, it's always like, "Cool, I'm going to try this."
